contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Adalbert}} '''Adalbert''' may refer to: * [[Adalbert (given name)]], an archaic masculine given name * [[Adalbert (mystic)]] (8th century) * [[Max Adalbert]] (1874–1933), German actor * [[Adalbert of Egmond]] * [[Adalbert of Magdeburg]] (d. 981), Apostle of the Slavs, first Archbishop of Magdeburg * [[Adalbert of Prague]] (956–997), martyred Bishop of Prague and missionary * [[Adalbert Stifter]] (1805-1868), Austrian poet ==See also== * [[Saint-Adalbert]] {{hndis|Adalbert}}
